name: Ansible corey dev
postCreateCommand: cd /tmp; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/master/tools/install.sh && sh install.sh --unattended && if [ -d ~/dotfiles ]; then rm ~/.zshrc; /usr/local/bin/dotbot -c ~/dotfiles/install.conf.yaml; fi && cd ~/; ln -s /workspaces/ansible ~/ansible && cp ~/dotfiles/.devcontainer/resolv.conf /etc/resolv.conf
